CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is clear that the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM - based devices exhibited better photovoltaic properties as compared to the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM - based devices , which can be attributed to the stronger absorption of PC71BM than PC61BM in the visible region from 440 to 530 nm , as shown in Figure 1b.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |
